Rulings.Edison: ●When you activate Spell Vanishing, you get to search your opponent's Deck to look for any Spell Cards of the same name as the destroyed Spell Card.
Rulings.Tengu: ●When you activate Spell Vanishing, you get to search your opponent's Deck to look for any Spell Cards of the same name as the destroyed Spell Card.
Rulings.Goat:
●When you activate Spell Vanishing, you get to search your opponent's Deck to look for any Spell Cards of the same name as the destroyed Spell Card. 1/05/2004
●Q: “Spell Vanishing” doesn't state to shuffle the decks after played. Do I shuffle anyways? 
A: Anytime you search your deck for a card or place a card into your deck you MUST shuffle your deck when finished, even if the effect did not tell you to.
